title: kunrakkuDi manra
sahitya:
kunrakkuDi manra kumaranai daNDaniDa senru kaNDOrkku janma sAphalyam uNDu


anupallavi

  kanriDam tAip-pashu koNDiruppadu pOl kunrAp-parivu koNDu ninru kATSi tarum


caraNam    innal aDuttu veghu tunbappaDuttum pOdu tannaDi tEDi varum anbarin iDar tIra
enrumE tAngiyavar Engit-tavikkAmal inba sukham aLikkum irakkamODu sirakkum
